name: Cedar (Prototype Relaxation Game)
description:
This is my first Unity game prototype, based on code I learned from Zenva Academy's Unity mobile game course. After finishing the class, I took some time to clean up the graphics, add some particle effects, sound effects, music, and multiple levels. 

I found it simple and satisfying to "pop" the polygons, so I'm continuing to develop it as a relaxation app, kind of like a digital bubble wrap on your phone.
